snippet: The Islamic State is pouring reinforcements into the besieged Syrian city of Kobani, a Kurdish enclave, despite heavy attacks from American-led aircraft.
abstract: Islamic State is pouring reinforcements into the besieged Syrian city of Kobani; rush of heavily armed militants from multiple directions has provided allied warplanes with array of targets from air, in contrast with strategy in recent days to disperse and avoid American-led aircraft attacks.

byline.original: By ERIC SCHMITT and KAREEM FAHIM
byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt reported from Washington, and Kareem Fahim from Mursitpinar, Turkey. Karam Shoumali contributed reporting from Mursitpinar, and Sebnem Arsu from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: The Islamic State is pouring reinforcements into the besieged Syrian city of Kobani, a Kurdish enclave, despite heavy attacks from American-led aircraft.

headline.main: ISIS Intensifies Siege of Kurdish Enclave in Syria
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Intensifies Siege of Kurdish Enclave in Syria
